content.title: You may not be able to get a divorce in England or Wales
content.reason: Your answers indicate that the courts of England and Wales do not have the jurisdiction to grant you a divorce.
content.advice: You can now do one of the following:
content.option1: check how you're legally connected again
content.option2: show all the possible connections and choose yourself
content.option3: exit the divorce service and get legal advice
